page.title: 13HAIR STYLES
page.content: When me and my friend SARAH BACKWAY went to {"Hairs and Graces"},we asked them if they do PUNK and they said 'NO'.Then we asked when people have their hair dyed what colour do they have it and the lady said'NATURAL COLOUR'and that any age come in.The most popular hair style out of perm or just trimmed is the same each way and{ {WOMEN}tend to come in more than {MEN}. When we asked if old or young people come in most they said old.When we asked which is the busiest time of day and what day of the week they said {FRIDAY }and{SATURDAY}and dinner time. We asked them if lots of childen come in and they said'YES'.
